title: Semi-Quantitative Evaluation of Access and Coverage (SQUEAC) Tools in R
text: recent past, measurement coverage mainly two-stage cluster sampled surveys either part nutrition assessment specific coverage survey known Centric Systematic Area Sampling (CSAS). However, methods resource intensive often used final programme evaluation meaning results arrive late programme adaptation. SQUEAC, stands Semi-Quantitative Evaluation Access Coverage, low resource method designed specifically address limitation used regularly monitoring, planning importantly, timely improvement programme quality, agency Ministry Health (MoH) led programmes. package provides functions use conducting SQUEAC investigation.

what: Semi-Quantitative Evaluation of Access and Coverage (SQUEAC) Tools in R — squeacr
title: Semi-Quantitative Evaluation of Access and Coverage (SQUEAC) Tools in R — squeacr
text: recent past, measurement coverage mainly two-stage cluster sampled surveys either part nutrition assessment specific coverage survey known Centric Systematic Area Sampling (CSAS). However, methods resource intensive often used final programme evaluation meaning results arrive late programme adaptation. SQUEAC, stands Semi-Quantitative Evaluation Access Coverage, low resource method designed specifically address limitation used regularly monitoring, planning importantly, timely improvement programme quality, agency Ministry Health (MoH) led programmes. package provides functions use conducting SQUEAC investigation.

title: Semi-Quantitative Evaluation of Access and Coverage (SQUEAC) Tools in R — squeacr
text: Myatt, Mark et al. 2012. Semi-Quantitative Evaluation Access Coverage (SQUEAC)/Simplified Lot Quality Assurance Sampling Evaluation Access Coverage (SLEAC) Technical Reference. Washington, DC: FHI 360/FANTA.

title: Semi-Quantitative Evaluation of Access and Coverage (SQUEAC) Tools in R — squeacr
